description: Santa Perucha is a family-owned business, inspired by over 30 years of experience from her parents. Established during the pandemic, the brand focuses on producing high-quality charcoal while promoting job opportunities for hardworking Peruvian women. With a commitment to sustainability, Santa Perucha utilizes waste from sawmills, ensuring eco-friendly practices. The initiative aims to empower women in the industry and enhance the quality of life for their communities through responsible business practices.
name: Santa Perucha
